fields.description:
h5. Description:
During liveview sessions, color information is shown in the studio console as strange numeric codes. This color information should be disabled for studio integration.

{code}
[DEBUG] :     Terminating all iOS simulators
[32m [INFO][39m   LiveView Server Started on Port [1m 8324[22m 
[32m [INFO][39m   Liveview Event Server Started on Port [1m 8323[22m 
{code}

h5. Steps to reproduce:
1) Create a new simulator launch with liveview 

h5. Result:
Console output contains color information which has difficulty displaying

h5. Expected Result:
Console output legible and with no strange numeric codes.
fields.environment:
Mac OS 10.8.3, Ubuntu 12.04
Xcode 4.6
CLI: 3.1.0, 3.1.1
Alloy: 1.1.1, 1.1.3
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201304302240, 3.1.2.X
Titanium SDK version  3.1.1.v20130430164508, 3.1.2.X

comments.body: Launching as child process, likely not respecting no-colors flag.

This is not completely fixed.

This seems to be an edge-case related to this particular line of output.

The other liveview lines seem formatted correctly.

See screenshot 'liveview-console-android-emulator-linux.png'.

Appcelerator Studio 3.1.2.201306201813: Mountain Lion 10.8.4, Ubuntu 12.04 64-bit
LiveView Plugin: 1.0.0.201306201804
LiveView: 0.1.24
Node.js: 0.8.22, 0.8.23
NPM: 1.2.14, 1.2.18
Titanium CLI: 3.1.1
Titanium SDK: 3.1.2.v20130619101604
Titanium Alloy: 1.1.3
Android SDK Tools: r22.0.1
Android Emulator: Google APIs 2.3.3

Studio build command:

{code}
"/home/linux/Desktop/node-v0.8.23-linux-x64/bin/titanium" "--no-colors" "--no-prompt" "build" "--platform" "android" "--sdk" "3.1.2.v20130619101604" "--log-level" "trace" "--target" "emulator" "--android-sdk" "/home/linux/Desktop/android-sdk" "--avd-id" "4" "--avd-abi" "armeabi" "--avd-skin" "WQVGA400" "--skip-js-minify" "--liveview" "--deploy-type" "development"
{code}

Re-opening.

Note: This could be an instance of TIMOB-11869. If that is the case, please re-close this ticket as fixed. Thanks.
This looks fixed with LiveView 0.1.27 from my local testing.
Closing. Not seen on Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201308091728, OSX 10.8.3.
